lead_paragraph: Russia's men's quadruple sculls crew have been banned from the Rio Olympics after one of their members failed a doping test in May, the world governing body FISA said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Russian Crew Banned From Rio, New Zealand Get Their Place
headline.main: Russian Crew Banned From Rio, New Zealand Get Their Place

snippet: Russia's men's quadruple sculls crew have been banned from the Rio Olympics after one of their members failed a doping test in May, the world governing body FISA said on Friday....
